logtailor package¶

Submodules¶

logtailor.logtailor module¶

Logfile analysis tool.

class logtailor.logtailor.Configuration(path: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

Manages configuration file access to items.

Provides: logs: Dict[str, str] - mapping of keys to logfiles. triggers: List[str] - list of triggers. output: Path - trace file.

property logs¶

Configured logfiles with their keys.

Returns

dictionary of key: logfile pairs.

Return type

Dict[str, Path]

property output¶

Configured path to output file.

Returns

path to output file.

Return type

Path

property triggers¶

Configured triggers.

Returns

list of triggers.

Return type

List[str]

logtailor.logtailor.determine_triggers(triggers, add_triggers, use_triggers)[source]¶

Determine set of effective triggers.

Parameters

  • triggers (List[str]) – list of configured triggers.

  • add_triggers (List[str]) – additional triggers.

  • use_triggers (bool) – triggers shall be applied.

Returns

list of effective triggers.

Return type

List[str]

logtailor.logtailor.mode(is_append: bool)[source]¶

Write mode dependend on is_append.

logtailor.logtailor.out(f_out, line: str)[source]¶

Write line to output.

logtailor.logtailor.print_version_and_exit()[source]¶

Print version and copyright info to stderr and exit with 0.

logtailor.logtailor.processor_factory(log_files: List[pathlib.Path], triggers: List[str], log_queue: queue.Queue, cancel_event: threading.Event, tailing: bool, history: bool, encoding: str)[source]¶

Create a processor instance.

Parameters

  • log_files (List[Path]) – list of logfiles to parse.

  • triggers (List[str]) – search the logfiles for these triggers.

  • log_queue (Queue) – deliver filtered lines in this queue.

  • cancel_event (Event) – trigger to cancel logile processing.

  • tailing (bool) – wait for more data at eol.

  • history (bool) – parse log file entries recorded before start of the tool.

  • encoding (str) – encoding of the log file.

Returns

a log processor instance.

Return type

LogProcessor

logtailor.logtailor.render_log(log_queue: queue.Queue, f_out, cancel: threading.Event)[source]¶

Render lines read from queue.

logtailor.logtailor.validate_log(parse_all: bool, log: str, logs: Dict[str, pathlib.Path])[source]¶

Validate given log.

Parameters

  • parse_all (boolean) – parse all configured log files.

  • log (str) – path or reference to a logfile to parse.

  • logs (Dict[str, Path]) – a map of references to configured log files for convenience.

Returns

one or more logfiles to parse.

Return type

List[Path]

logtailor.logtailor.verbose_info(log_files, triggers)[source]¶

Print verbose information to stderr.

Parameters

  • log_files (List[Path]) – list of log files.

  • triggers (List[str]) – list of triggers.
